price: . Na wanasema: Lini ahadi hii, ikiwa mnasema kweli?
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
footnotes: Na makafiri wanakusudia kuikanusha Siku ya Akhera, basi wanaihimiza kwa kejeli na kusema: Itakuwa lini hiyo adhabu unayo tuahidi, kama wewe, ewe Mtume, na hao walio pamoja nawe, ni wakweli katika hayo mnayo yaamini na mnatuitia sisi tuyakubali?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-waʿdu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
